product_name: MORFOSE Ultra Aqua Hair Gel Wax 175ml
description:
Crafted to help you tame flyways, manage braids, or create a professional look our aqua hair gel wax gives you more control over your style, so you always look amazing.

A non-greasy formula that’s light, versatile, and won’t cause flakes, streaks, or white residue you can capture the perfect hairstyle without worrying about thick clumps.

This is a water-based hair gel which means it goes on smooth and clean and rinses away just as easily when it’s time to let your hair down. Perfect for all hair types, styles, and colors.

Morfose hair wax gel comes in a high-quality tin container that makes it easy to use at home, at work, when you’re traveling, and just about anywhere else.

Suitable for all hair types.

Features: * Thick foam footrest, seat and backrest cushion * matching stool option * Comfortable white vinyl PVC material * Removable face pillow * Removable arms rest (without screws or nuts) * Adjustable headrest, backrest and leg restTechnical Specifications: * Length: 74 inches * Height: 30 inches * Width: 25 inches * Weight capacity: 300lb * All dimensions listed are approximations*Some assembly required*
Color: Alpine White This facial bed has thick foam footrest, seat and backrest cushions which are covered with white PVC vinyl material. Its lightweight design provides all the comforts of a large bed but also provide complete flexibility. It features a face cut-out pillow and fully removable armrests (without screws or nuts). It also has adjustable head, back and leg rests; the back of the chair is adjustable upward for customer comfort, and the footrest is adjustable downward. This is ideal for facials, skin care, massage, tattooing, or body piercing. This chair also features a storage area with drawers beneath the seat.

product_name: "REEMA" White Aesthetic Bed with Hydraulic Pump
description:
Features:
HEAVY-duty hydraulic lift pump
Sleek Design
Manually adjustable back rest and leg rest
Removable arm rests and pillow
Facial hole for face down positioning
Rotates 360 Degrees

 

Specifications:

Upholstered in PVC vinyl
Hydraulic pump has a 1.58" shaft diameter with a 7.7" stroke
Height adjustment from 23.5" to 30"
Back rest adjustment from 0 flat to 65 Degrees upward incline
Leg rest adjustment from 0 flat to 45 Degrees downward decline
Rotates in horizontal direction and locks in location with foot lever
Capacity 400 lbs.

 

Product Dimensions:

Default position: 72" x 24" x 23" (L x W x H)
Arm rest width: 4"
Cushion thickness: 4"
Hydraulic base: 36" x 23" (L x W)
Default position: Bed completely flat, lowest height, w/o arms
All heights measured from ground to top of seat cushion

product_name: "MEHA" White Electric Aesthetic Bed with Motor
description:
Features an adjustable backrest and leg support for maximum client comfort. Height is adjustable electronically via a remote. Max height is 83cm and min height is 63cm. The locking hydraulic pump enables height adjustment Maximum weight load 150kg. An essential in any beauty parlour. Electric motor to adjust for overall height via remote. Upholstered in PVC leather. Adjustable leg and back rest (manual) Sturdy structure Rubber feet for anti-slip Available in white W:185 D:63 H:63-83 Assembly required  
Weight 37 kg
Dimensions 65 x 124 x 82 cm

product_name: TORO Salon Double Waiting Chair With Backrest
description:
This contemporary styled loveseat couch is both comfortable and durable. It features a modern double seat. Upholstered in a soft PVC vinyl, the loveseat is easy to keep clean and maintain. It's also durable and built to last, and will definitely power through normal wear and tear. The cushioning is padded nicely so comfort is also a priority.

Features

  • Unique reception bench design.
  • Soft PVC vinyl upholstery.
  • Well-padded cushion.
  • Plenty of seating space.
  • Great for waiting areas.

Specifications

  • Height: 34"
  • Seat Height: 17"
  • Width: 53"
  • Depth: 23"

description: Traceless, pain-free bobbles in a riot of colours. Unlike traditional hairbands, the EZ bobble leaves no trace it was ever there! Wear your hair in a ponytail all day and when you pop the EZ Bobble off, your hair goes back to the way it was before you put it on - no hairband kink. The EZ Bobble also holds your hair tight, but without causing damage or tension headaches. Available in 7 colours: Black, Brown, Red, Clear, Lilac, Hot Pink and Yellow. *Colour you receive will vary and is according to stock availability.

description:

The steamer also has a UV light that sanitizes the machine and reduces contamination. The rotating spray head offers unparalleled control while the large glass reservoir holds enough water for even the longest sessions. The unit has a built-in timer and independent controls for the steamer.

description:
iBlonde Hair Bleaching Blue Powder 500g 
Ammonia Free Bleach. From the most highly advanced Research Kleral Have created a new Generation bleach without ammonia. Thanks to its innovative formula, now it is possible to get strong and medium bleaching and highlights without damaging your hair.
Instruction:
Bleaching Powder can be used with creamy Peroxide at 1 part of powder 2 part of oxydizer.
Put the amount of powder required into a non metallic bowl, and add the following mixing to obtain a soft creamy consistency. 20 volume for normal bleaching, 30 volume for highlights.
Time Required:
Leave the cream for 20 to 30 minutes according to hair bottom and to bleacher desired
The quantity of lightening tones and the success of the process depands on the strength of the creamy peroxide used and on its factor of protection against over oxidation.
Don't exceed the suggested Laying time:
3 Tones  = 20 Volume (6%) = 20 Minutes
4 Tones = 30 Volumes (9%) = 25 Minutes
6 Tones = 40 Volumes (12%) = 35 Minutes

product_name: KLERAL SYSTEM Biogenesi Aqua Color 60ml - No Ammonia - No Peroxide
description:
Made in Italy. Mixing Ratio 1 : 6

Aquacolor Water Based Hair Color, Ecological And Eco Friendly Formula Permanent Hair Color In Powder Ammonia Free Ammonia Free Resorcinol Free Ethanol Amine Free Phthalates Free Sls, Sirs, Sulphate Free Paraben Free Mineral Oil Free Preservative Free Allergens Free Gluten Free, Vegan Ok Not Tested On Animals AQUACOLOR is a delicate permanent coloring powder, It does not contain ammonia and you can mix it simply with water. NO DEVELOPER/PEROXIDE IS REQUIRED. Its sweet formula does not have lightening effect, but as high tonalzing power allows you to perfectly cover grey/white hair, ensuring a natural. shiny and durable color. PREPARATION: Wear appropriate protective garments: gloves and head cover. Provide with a precision scale to balance and to weight correctly the ingredients: Use potable water for the muting. For best results: follow closely the instructions on the packaging and the recommended doses in order to weight and to mix the different ingredients and to get the right coloring blend. APPLICATION First time colouring, regrowth coverage and high percentage of white/grey hair to be covered (more then 30%). follow the MIXING RATIO 1:6 into non metallic bowl, pour 10 gr of Aquacolor powder together with 60 ml of water, then mix it well. Apply the coloured blend onto the hair following the usual hair coloring process. Leave it for 40-45 minutes (depending on the percentage of the grey/white hair to be covered and by the hair absorption capacity), At the end of the laying time, proceed with a suited post-color shampooing, rinse thoroughly. then style as you prefer. For subsequent coloring or toning service, application on hair length and low percentage of white/grey to be covered (Less than 30%) follow the MIXING RATIO 1:10, Into non metallic bowl, pour 10 gr of Aquacolor powder together with 100 ml of water, then mix it well. Apply the coloured blend onto the hair, leave it for 20-25 minutes. At the end of the laying time, proceed with a suited post-color shampooing, rinse thoroughly then style as you prefer.

description:
Double Wax Warmer Heater  Size: 14”L x 8.7”D x 7.5”H Fits 14oz and 18oz Cans Product Features:

All Metal Construction Built In Aluminum Pot Premium Internal Heating Element CE Certified and Fuse Protected Double Removable Wax Aluminum Pot Thermostat Control Knob Allows Temperature to Be Continuously Up To 80 Melts all Types of Depilator

Adjustable temperature settings of 0-80 degrees Celsius (32-176 Degrees Fahrenheit) Removable inner wax basket Metal construction body and pot 4 Inch pots opening to accommodate most wax containers on the market Temperature Measurement: Celsius Color: White

The melted wax that is placed in the equipment can flow from the upper pot to the bottom pot so the wax maintains heated. The user can adjust the temperature according to his preferences. Specifications:  Voltage / operating frequency AC (220-240V/50Hz) Power 500 W Size External dimensions W 50 x D 24.5 x H 24.5 cm Inner dimensions 17.5 x H 13.3 cm Capacity 2 recipients of each 2500 ml Maximum temperature 105ºC Data sheet Type of warmer: Hot wax Power: 500W Thermostat: 0-105ºC Extras: Metal filter Capacity: 5L Using the equipment:  1. Place the equipment on a flat surface. 2. Open the lid and put the depilatory wax in the upper pot. Place the pot in the upper reservoir and put the lid back on. 3. Connect the equipment to power and switch the equipment on. Turn the temperature control knob for the top pan clockwise until you reach the maximum temperature. The indicator light will turn red and the equipment starts working. 4. When the wax has melted and has moved from the highest pan to the lower pan, the wax is ready for use at a temperature in accordance to your preference. 5. Depilatory wax adheres to the hair more easily if the skin is cleaned thoroughly before application. 6. Apply the depilatory wax evenly on the skin in the direction of hair growth using a stick. 7. When the wax has dried, tear it off fast in the opposite direction of hair growth. 8. Clean the inside of the equipment and remove wax residues after each use, using a special cleansing product.

description: Roll On Electric Wax Heater For Depilatory Wax Hair Removal This roll on wax heater gives you all the benefits of waxing, but with an easy to roll on applicator. No more spatulas and sticks! Waxing gives your skin that smooth and flawless feel you've always wanted. Since its small and portable, its easy to take anywhere you travel. The wax cartridges are disposable making most of the clean up an absolute breeze. The protective cover prevents dust so it lasts longer. This little unit makes a great addition to any home or salon! Operation: Before use, make sure the skin is absolutely clean. Insert the wax cartridge into the wax machine. Plug it in and turn on the power. Heat the wax machine for about 20-30min then begin Roll the product over skin in the direction that the hair grows in small areas that you want depilated. Place the nonwaven fabric strip firmly over waxed area Tear off the hair-removal paper in the reverse direction that the hair grows. After hair removal, use the cleanser to clean off any residues the wax may have left behind. After cleaning, use a moisturizer for the smoothest skin you've ever had! The less movement that occurs during the first 15 minutes, the more control you will have over the frizz. Once your hair dries, you can easily soften your look by simply moving your hair around. The more you play with your hair the more volume you will achieve. Some people start appreciating their volume and curls once they have total control over the frizz. The Curl Keeper’s formula re-activates with water, so simply re-wetting frizzy areas with wet hands could get you many fantastic frizz-free days between shampoos!

The vacuum breaker is used to avoid backflow or negative pressure in a plumbing system. It allows air to enter the water system if a siphon attempts to form. Inside the elbow is a poppet valve that is held "up" by the water pressure found in the system, closing the air entrance to the device. If the pressure in the "upstream side" is reduced to atmospheric pressure or below, the poppet valve drops and allows air to enter the system, breaking the siphon. It is often required by municipal water codes and allows for quick and trouble-free draining.

Features

  • Allows an even flow for the shampoo unit's faucet.
  • Allow for quick and trouble free draining.
  • Approved for municipal water coded.
  • UPC Certified.

Specifications

  • Length: 5.5"
  • Width: 2"
  • Per pipe: 0.5"
  • Some assembly is required.

Thanks to its innovative formula, now it is possible to get strong and medium bleaching and highlights without damaging your hair. Instruction: Bleaching Powder can be used with creamy Peroxide at 1 part of powder 2 part of oxydizer. Put the amount of powder required into a non metallic bowl, and add the following mixing to obtain a soft creamy consistency. 20 volume for normal bleaching, 30 volume for highlights. Time Required: Leave the cream for 20 to 30 minutes according to hair bottom and to bleacher desired The quantity of lightening tones and the success of the process depands on the strength of the creamy peroxide used and on its factor of protection against over oxidation. Don’t exceed the suggested Laying time: 3 Tones = 20 Volume (6%) = 20 Minutes 4 Tones = 30 Volumes (9%) = 25 Minutes 6 Tones = 40 Volumes (12%) = 35 Minutes

- WITHOUT FORMALDEHYDE
- WITHOUT PARABINES
- WITHOUT MINERAL OILS

Natural SMOOTH & SILK SYSTEM, KLERAL ~ ORGANIC BOND COMPLEX

It is a three-step treatment.

N'1 - GLOBAL SHAMPOO AGAINST BREAST HAIR

SILK STRAIGHT shampoo with organic ingredients and MORING OIL prepares hair for the treatment process.
It gently cleanses the scalp and raises the epidermis so that the agent can change the tie in the hair.

N'2 - LOSION FOR SMELING AND HANDLING OF HAIR

It softens the hair bindings and disciplines the hair fiber in a natural way. This product fills the voids in the hair and drastically reduces the crepe and porosity of the hair.

When the flesh is filled with proteins and keratin, the epidermis completely closes the hair.
Thus, water that would otherwise accumulate under the epidermis and create a crepe refuses. After the second phase, the fantastic and smooth appearance is guaranteed. Of course in a natural way without risk.

N'3 - GLOBAL GLASS GLASS FOR GLASS FOR GLASS VIDEO

It is part of the final, final phase of the process.
Finishes and protects the process of natural hair treatment. Make sure the hairbrush is completely closed.

The hair becomes soft and shiny. You will be thrilled with the smoothness of the hair.
You will easily break them and make hairstyles to your liking.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE:

STEP NO. 1

Hair shampoo well with KS SILK STRAIGHT 1 and rinse well.

Continue with step no.

STEP NO. 2

Apply the KS SILK STRAIGHT TRATMENT 2 from the root to the tips, use a brush, and let it work for 20 minutes.
I advise you to heat up with heat. Dry completely dry until dry. Straighten your hair very well. Every strand of at least five times. Adjust the jar to 180 ° c for thin and normal hair.

Then rinse your hair and proceed to step 3.

STEP NO. 3

Organic treatment process is completed by application of SILK STRAIGHT CREAM BALSY 3. Cleave the hair, heat it under heat medium for about 10 minutes.
Wash your hair under warm water and finish your hair as usual.

The end result?

The hair is perfectly soft and smooth.
The crepe will drastically decrease and you will enjoy the softness of your hair.

product_name: JOICO JOIMIST Firm Hold Finishing Spray - 300ml
description:
Joico JoiMist Firm Finishing Spray is perfect for fine and coarse hair to give hair a firm hold and humidity protection as well. It is perfect for restyling as it can be brushed through and restyled. It will give shine, moisture and body.
Joimist Humidity Resistant Firm Hold Fast-drying Size: 9.1 ounces Hair type: Dry

product_name: JOICO JOIFIX Firm Hold Finishing Spray - 300ml
description:
There are those moments in life – say, after a really intense session with an intricate updo, or time well spent with your hot rollers – when you need a forceful hairspray that just won’t let you down; the kind of product designed to stand firm no matter how demanding the ‘do. And this intense-hold non-aerosol Finishing Spray steps up to the plate every single time.

Perfect choice for: All hair types and styles – our super-charged spray never backs down from a challenge, no matter how much holding power you need.

Here’s how: Not too much, not too little: Simply blowdry your hair; coif and primp to your heart’s content; then spritz this non-aerosol formula over your finished style, holding it a good 12 inches from hair for perfect coverage.

The inside secret: Panthenol – our favorite, Vitamin B5-based humectant – does a trifecta of duties: delivering moisture; shielding hair from pesky humidity; and adding a serious dose of shine. UV protectants guard against the ravages of sun exposure. And our exclusive Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex helps reconstruct the hair from cuticle to cortex.

product_name: JOICO JOIFIX Medium Hold Styling & Finishing Spray - 300ml
description:
When you’re looking for a styling spray that’s not too stiff, not too wimpy, and still allows you the versatility to play with a hairstyle after it’s locked in, look no further than one of our very favorites: This medium-hold non-aerosol Finishing Spray gives you that sought-after stability with none of the stiffness that spoils a great cut and style.

Perfect choice for: Any hair type; but if you live in a humid climate, we guarantee you’ll crave its frizz-busting features.

Here’s how: Spray gently onto damp hair and blow out as usual; or apply a fine mist over your freshly-dried coif to keep it tame long after you walk out the door.

The inside secret: UV protectants along with Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex – our exclusive blend of high-tech proteins – creates a unique “net of defense” over your hair, shielding it from harsh sun rays and exposure to environmental stresses.

product_name: JOICO JOISHAPE Classic Shaping & Finishing Spray - 300ml
description:
Sometimes you’re looking for a little something lighter. Like a hairspray that doesn’t leave you with helmet head; allows for a bit of swing and shaping; and makes it perfectly okay to take a brush to your freshly-spritzed locks without worrying that you’ve just undone all your work. Kind of like our famous JoiShape Finishing Spray. In fact, exactly like our JoiShape Finishing Spray.

Perfect choice for: Fine hair is the ideal candidate for this medium-hold product. But so is any ‘do that might want to double-down on hairspray without worrying about build-up or touchability.

Here’s how: Hold the can 8-10 inches from hair and give a light spritz. Or spritz twice – no worries allowed.

The inside secret: Our exclusive Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex and UV protectants give this formula the ability to fight back against humidity, sun, and extreme thermal styling tools.

product_name: JOICO FLIP TURN Volumizing Finishing Spray - 300ml
description:
It’s the Olympics of hair maneuvers. We’re talking about that classic, flip-your-head-upside-down-for-a-volumizing-fluff drill. And we just made the move ten times better with the most exciting styling spray you’ll ever get your hands into: Spritz your locks upside-down, sideways, backwards… however and wherever you need a hit of texture and volume. Our innovatively-designed nozzle super-charges hair with big-time body from any angle; the Level 10 holding power locks in volume and shine for a full 72 hours. Trust us: You’ll flip for the stuff.

Perfect choice for: Any hair type – but even the finest, skimpiest locks will transform before your very eyes.

Here’s how: Spray with abandon in any direction; our unique “actuator” allows for 360-degree sprayability; and dries in seconds for a firm, touchable finish that actually guards against the ravages of humidity and heat styling.

The inside secret: AquaLastik (our deep-sea antioxidant) protects strands from harsh thermal stylers; while Bio-Advanced Peptide Complex delivers strength and unparalleled shine.

BUY 2, GET 1 FREE DEAL iBlonde Hair Bleaching Blue Powder 500g 
Ammonia Free Bleach. From the most highly advanced Research Kleral Have created a new Generation bleach without ammonia. Thanks to its innovative formula, now it is possible to get strong and medium bleaching and highlights without damaging your hair.
Instruction:
Bleaching Powder can be used with creamy Peroxide at 1 part of powder 2 part of oxydizer.
Put the amount of powder required into a non metallic bowl, and add the following mixing to obtain a soft creamy consistency. 20 volume for normal bleaching, 30 volume for highlights.
Time Required:
Leave the cream for 20 to 30 minutes according to hair bottom and to bleacher desired
The quantity of lightening tones and the success of the process depands on the strength of the creamy peroxide used and on its factor of protection against over oxidation.
Don't exceed the suggested Laying time:
3 Tones  = 20 Volume (6%) = 20 Minutes
4 Tones = 30 Volumes (9%) = 25 Minutes
6 Tones = 40 Volumes (12%) = 35 Minutes

product_name: L’Oréal DIA RICHESSE Professional Demi-Permanent Hair Color
description:
L'Oréal Professionnel ammonia-free haircolor enhances natural color with radiant and brilliant tones. Tone on tone color is ideal for first time color covering the first signs of white hair. DIA Richesse demi-permanent haircolor offers quick, predictable, customized results with no ammonia, rich tones and incredible shine. Ideal for natural or colored hair with up to 70% white hair. Luminous demi-permanent gel-crème haircolor without ammonia. Rich demi-permanent crème haircolor without ammonia.

Application :Visit the Academy on Demand in the Professionals section for more information.

Technology: Advanced alkaline technology that is ideal for natural or color-treated hair

Results/Effect : Rich and deep reflects with exceptional softness and ultra-shiny result.

Use with (Complementary Products) : 76 shades

Development Time : Between 2 - 20 minutes.

Lightening : Up to 1.5 levels of lift.

Coverage : Natural looking demi-blended coverage of up to 70% white hair.

Usage Caution : IMPORTANT: A hair colorant can cause an allergic reaction. A skin allergy test must be completed 48 hours before application of any hair colorant. Follow the safety instructions on the inside of the carton.

description: Colour correcting cream for brunettes, anti-redness system. In just one action, brown correcting pigments neutralize artificial red tones for a pure and natural brunette colour. Alternate with your usual conditioner, leave on for 2-5 minutes and rinse thoroughly. Easy to distribute with a no drip formula.

product_name: L’Oreal Professional Vitamino Color CC Cream Blondes-150ml
description: Protect your blonde highlights from going yellow with the Vitamino Color A-OX CC Cream for blonde hair. In just one action, neutralise brassy tones for a magnified blonde and more natural looking tones. Hair is left feeling smooth and the blonde tones perfected. Apply to washed and towel-dried hair for 5 to 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and ensure the product is fully removed.

product_name: L’Oreal Professional Vitamino A-OX Color 10 In 1-190ml
description: Meet our colour radiance perfecting 10 in 1 spray from Vitamino Color A-OX range. Used before or after hair colouring, for 10 instant benefits – protection for hair colour radiance, shine, soft feeling, consistency, heat protection up to 230 degrees, detangling, helps blow-dry, anti-breakage*, helps reduce the appearance of split ends and protects against the look of frizz. That’s a long list!

product_name: Schwarzkopf Bonacure pH 4.5 Color Freeze Micellar Rich Shampoo
description: Schwarzkopf Professional BC Bonacure pH 4.5 Colour Freeze Micellar Rich Shampoo (250ml) gently yet effectively cleanses porous, coloured or highlighted hair which has been over-processed. Formulated with additional Keratin to repair structural damage and Apricot Oil to smooth and protect the hair surface, Cell Perfector Technology then seals the surface for enhanced shine. By adjusting the hair to its optimal pH value of 4.5, this shampoo freezes colour pigments deep inside the hair fibre, ensuring intense, vibrant colour which lasts. Directions of use: • Apply to wet hair. Work into a lather, rinse and repeat if necessary. • For optimum results, follow with the pH 4.5 Colour Freeze treatment of your choice.

description: This is a highly pigmented neutralising wash, which provides a gentle sulphate free cleansing. Quickly neutralises stubborn yellow undertones on lightened hair at the backwash for cool blonde results. This wash provides a gentle cleansing action and instant tonal deposits to neutralise underlying warm tones.

product_name: Schwarzkopf BlondMe Bond Enforcing Premium Lightener 9+
description:
Blondme Bond Enforcing Premium Lightener 9+ is a high performance powder lightener. This is the first powder lightener to provide up to 9 levels of lift on natural and coloured hair. It offers perfect neutralisation thanks to it's anti-yellow-agents which directly target the pheomelanin in hair to avoid unwanted warm or yellow undertones.
FEATURES
• Integrated bonding technology
• Up to 9 levels of lift
• Helps to protect the hair fiber during development for minimized hair breakage
• Anti-yellow agents to neutralize any warm undertones
• Flexible mixing ratio
• Easy workable consistency
• Suitable for all technique
HOW TO USE
• Always use in combination with BLONDME® Premium Developers.
• Mix 1:1.5 to 1:2.5 (Ex: 30g BLONDME Premium Lightener 9+ and 45-75 mL BLONDME Premium Developer).
• On-Scalp Application : BLONDME Premium Developer 2% (7 Vol.) or 6% (20 Vol.).
• Off-Scalp Application : BLONDME Premium Developer 9% (30 Vol.).
• Apply to dry hair and let develop for 20 to 45 minutes.
• Additional heat is not recommended.
• Visually check progress during development time.
PRO-TIP
• For gentle lightening and optimal time control, use BLONDME Premium Developer 2% (7 Vol.).
• Check visually every 5 minutes.

Blondme Bond Enforcing Premium Lightener 9+ is a high performance powder lightener. This is the first powder lightener to provide up to 9 levels of lift on natural and coloured hair. It offers perfect neutralisation thanks to it's anti-yellow-agents which directly target the pheomelanin in hair to avoid unwanted warm or yellow undertones.

FEATURES

  • Integrated bonding technology
  • Up to 9 levels of lift
  • Helps to protect the hair fiber during development for minimized hair breakage
  • Anti-yellow agents to neutralize any warm undertones
  • Flexible mixing ratio
  • Easy workable consistency
  • Suitable for all technique

LOW commitment color – lasts up to 3 washes!* Super easy to use at home, so you can change up your color to suit your mood. Features and Benefits: - Personalize your look by placing slices of soft pastel throughout your blonde hair. - Apply color from the ends up, for a pastel dip dye effect. - To softly neutralize your blonde color, use BLONDME INSTANT BLUSH ICE or, for a stronger neutralization effect, use BLONDME INSTANT BLUSH STEEL - BLONDME INSTANT BLUSHES are perfect for a party weekend or music festival. Flashes of pastel will take your look to the next level when you style a classic braid or bun.

product_name: OSiS+ Blow & Go Express Blow Dry Spray -200mL
description:
Osis Blow & Go Express Blow Dry Spray is a luxurious blow drying spray which reduces blow drying time and combats frizz effortlessly.

The essential styling aid for sleek and super smooth styles, Blow & Go Express Blow Dry Spray has a non-sticky formula which dramatically reduces the drying time whilst smoothing the hair and controlling frizz and fly-away strands.

.

product_name: OSiS+ Bouncy Curls Gel with Oil -200mL
description: OSiS+ Bouncy Curls Curl Gel with Oil 3 is a curl gel with oil. Lightweight but strong curl definition + gives bounce to fine to normal curls + soft touch.

product_name: Osis+ Curl Honey Curl and Wave Cream -150mL
description: Osis+ Curl Honey Curl Cream is made to calm coarse and frizzy curls. This rich curl honey defines shape and bounce while making the hair silky soft. Thermal protection form blow-drying gives you total coverage from frizz and damage. Tame the wild mane and your beautiful locks will be the star of the show!

product_name: OSiS+ Dust It Mattifying Volume Powder - 10ml
description:
Achieve your desired look easily with Schwarzkopf Osis Dust It. The lightweight mattifying powder provides light control, volume and texture. It gives your hair a soft matte effect while retaining freedom of movement. This hair-mattifying powder offers a long-lasting hold and a natural feel. Use a little or a lot to improve the controlling power. You can shake it directly into your hands and spread it around or apply it directly to the area that needs attention. It's available in a convenient 0.35 oz jar. Osis Dust It, Schwarzkopf, 0.35 oz:
  • Lightweight mattifying powder has a long-lasting hold and natural feel
  • Provides light control and separation
  • Multi-purpose volumizing and texturizing product
  • Gives hair a soft matte effect with natural movement
  • Lets you create styles with powder consistency
  • Schwarzkopf Dust It, 0.35 oz

Schwarzkopf Osis+ Elastic Flexible Hold Hairspray stretches hair to the limit. It's a natural hold finishing spray which injects energy and vitality into all hair styles. Infused with silicone copolymers to enhance hair suppleness, Elastic Flexible Hold Hairspray creates a natural, flexible hold often demanded by fashion trends. Sure to stretch your hair to its style limits, this professional finishing spray gives hair an added bounce while keeping your style looking flawless.

product_name: OSiS+ MS Fab Foam Classic Hold Mousse
description:
Create texture and volume with the Schwarzkopf Professional Osis+ Fab Foam - Classic Hold Mousse, a body-boosting hair styler for all hair types.

Perfect for styling texturized beach looks, the Osis+ Fab Foam Classic Hold Mousse offers your style flexible support, medium hold and enhanced shine.

Non-sticky and quick-drying, this classic styling mousse will help you create full-bodied blow-dry, bouncy curls and improved definition whilst protecting your hair from heat damage.

Schwarzkopf Professional Osis+ Flatliner Heat Protection Spray works to protect hair against thermal styling damage whilst taming frizz and flyaways. This styling spray is essential for straight styles, and is formulated with a unique blend of ingredients which protect hair from heat of up to 230c. Provides an optimum sleek finish with no frizz and super straight hair with an amazing, healthy shine. Directions of use:
  • Spray onto wet hair.
  • Dry hair thoroughly.
  • Style using your irons/curlers immediately once hair is dry.
Packaging may vary.

product_name: OSiS+ FlexWax UItra Strong Cream Wax
description:
Osis Flexwax Ultra Strong Cream Wax is a continuously re-moldable styling wax designed for unlimited style possibilities.

Providing all hair types with ultra-strong texture, separation and styling control, Flexwax Ultra Strong Cream Wax allows for a natural shine finish without any greasy residue. This professional styling wax washes out easily and is ideal for daily use.

Perfect for edgy, modern and trendy styles which demand texture and definition.

product_name: OSiS+ Freeze Pump Strong Hold Hairspray
description:
Spray OSiS+ Freeze Pump over dry hair for a lasting moldable fix. A Strong Hold Pump Spray with a protective easy-to-brush out formula, Freeze Pump shields against UV rays as it delivers a long lasting hold. The film forming resin buffers and protects against humidity, which means no more frizz, and the special formulation allows the hair to be molded after spraying.

The OSiS Freeze Pump hairspray is suitable for all hair types and hair lengths. Giving added definition, it's also ideal for wavy and curly hair.

Packaging may vary.

product_name: OSiS+ G Force Strong Hold Gel - 150mL
description:
The Schwarzkopf Osis G. Force is a powerful gel that provides long-lasting firmness and a beautiful finish. The formula contains various ingredients that provide a lot of control and strengthening of the hair. The gel contains moisturizing ingredients that help to style the hair, but also nourish the hair. In addition, there is a kind of resin in it and moisturizing glycerin in the gel, which ensures strong control, even in humid conditions. The gel is easy to wash out of the hair.
  • Long-lasting firmness
  • Strong hold
  • Nourishes the hair
  • For short to medium hair
  • Easy to wash out
Packaging may vary.

product_name: OSiS+ MS Grip Extreme Hold Mousse
description:
Achieve strong and stunning volume with extreme control and natural shine; OSiS+ Grip offers level 4 hold for statement volume looks, from free flowing to casual or serious glamour.

The rich, nourishing formula protects hair from heat styling damage up to 450°F, and the volumizing mousse has an anti-static effect to reduce flyaways while leaving hair feeling fuller.

Best way to use:  Shake well and dispense the styling mousse into your hand; apply a small amount of the volumizing product to damp hair; for maximum volume, blow-dry hair with a round brush.

Packaging may vary.

Osis+ Sparkler Shine Spray is the perfect finisher for your incredible style with an instant sparkling finish. Formulated with lightweight Silicone Oils which smooth and lightly condition the hair, Sparkler Shine Spray is the ultimate finishing touch to your styling regime.
  • Shine spray
  • Suitable for all hair type
  • Light control
  • Facilitates detangling
This finishing spray imparts shine, suppleness and an irresistible fragrance. Packaging may vary.

description: OSiS+ Tame Wild is a smoothing anti-frizz cream that provides surface smoothness, shine and strong control. Also delivers anti-frizz and anti-humidity effects for up to 7 days with heat protection up to 220°C/428°F.\n\nGreat for all hair types and hairstyles.

Get inspired by the fiber consistency. Go over the top or more mainstream. You will be thrilled at how easy it is to style & accentuate your hair! Get molding with OSiS+ Thrill Fibre Texture Gum. Its magic, mega elastic fibres make styling seem fun and fantastic whilst offering brilliant texture with shine and separation. With its mega elastic fibre technology, OSiS+ Thrill Fibre Texture Gum gives you the freedom of flexible texture effect. It provides strong texture control, great shine and separation to leave your hair styled, bendable and mouldable.
  • Superb shine.
  • Easy distribution.
  • No overload.
  • Creative definition.
  • Washes out easily.

product_name: OSiS+ MS Topped Up Gentle Hold Mousse - 200mL
description:
Boost your hair’s volume, shine and body with this Gentle Hold Mousse. This daily styling mousse is the perfect way to achieve significant volume that looks natural. Lightweight and non-crunchy, boost the bounce of even the finest and shortest of hair. Whilst creating a full-bodied look, this light control styler protects your hair against heat, and adds shine and reinforcement to each strand. The moisturising infusion of glycerine keeps hair healthy and hydrated and ensures that your style is locked in for longer!
  • Boosts volume, shine and body
  • Natural look
  • Lightweight
  • Non-crunchy
  • Protects against heat

Upload contains conditioning and natural shine ingredients to create contradictive styles on damp or dry hair. Schwarzkopf Osis+ Upload Volume Cream is pure volume with a dose of care for multi functional styling purposes. Delivering instant, lightweight volume and body to all hair types, Upload Cream smoothes and conditions the hair whilst adding natural body, movement and style.
  • Instant lightweight volume.
  • Natural shine with velvet like touch.
  • Medium styling control.
  • Smooth style separation.
  • Conditions and adds body.
  • Perfect for natural drying as well as using a blow dryer.
  • Control Level 2

product_name: OSiS+ Volume Up Volume Booster Spray
description:
OSiS+ Volume Up is a volume boosting styling spray for instant lift and texture.

Formulated with breakthrough Flex Web Technology, Volume Up enwraps the hair in a weightless flexible Polymer web which provides long lasting volume without compromising on the natural feel and movement of the hair.

The most convenient way to create strong volume and natural texture without blow drying, Volume Up boosts natural volume in all hair styles and leaves the hair with flexible movement and texture.

OSiS+ Whipped Wax adds texture to the hair and allows you to remold your style throughout the day.
Incredibly light and airy, Whipped Wax has an innovative light soufflé consistency which is enriched with Beeswax to deliver a natural shine .

Whipped Wax doesn’t overburden the hair but offers a strong hold to keep your style firmly in place throughout the day.
Perfect for adding texture and definition to short and choppy styles, Whipped Wax leaves the hair with re-workable structure and texture without any greasy residue.

OSIS+ Wind Touch is a light hold paste with the moldability of a cream. It can be blow-dried or air-dried for volume elevation and flexibility.

It is ideal for short to mid length hair and contains a cocktail of waxes & a flexible polymer.

Apply a small amount to damp hair and air dry or blow dry while styling with fingers. May also be applied to dry hair.

Key Benefits:
- Super fine sprayable powder
- Direct application nozzle allows micro-fine targeted powder distribution
- Root lift, volume and soft matte effect

Volumizing Root Spray Mousse works with a perfect composition of ingredients that boosts volume. The incredibly fine spray distribution enables the product to work directly where needed, especially at the roots. How to Use:  Shake the bottle well. Hold can upright. Spray directly to the roots or apply throughout the lengths of damp hair. Comb through. Hold Level can be adjusted by layering.

description:
Ensure your hair is protected from every eventuality with Schwarzkopf Professional Osis+ Session Label Miracle 15 Multi-Purpose Styling Balm, a multipurpose solution that nourishes, protects and styles your hair. Formulated with 15 benefits to protect and care for your hair, Osis+ Session Label Miracle 15 Balm is the ultimate multitasker for all hair types, but particularly those with thin or limp locks. The Osis+ Session Label Miracle 15 benefits include:
  1. Caring properties
  2. Improved hair hydration
  3. Helps prevent hair breakage
  4. Instantly detangles
  5. Sensational structure equalisation
  6. Delivers anti-static discipline
  7. Heat defence from up to 230 degree heat
  8. Mechanical damage protection
  9. Protection against UV exposure
  10. Improves manageability
  11. Delivers lightweight styling control
  12. Creates silkiness
  13. Up to 96 hour anti-frizz control

Easy to use, simply apply to damp hair and style as desired.

product_name: OSiS+ Play Tough Ultra Strong Waterproof Gel
description:
OSiS+ Play Tough is an ultra–strong waterproof gel for ultimate style and control. It has a non–sticky consistency with flexible application before it sets.

Schwarzkopf Osis Play Tough is an extreme water-resistant gel. Play Tough provides extreme control to the hair and also provides the perfect definition of the hair. Play tough can easily be washed out with shampoo and is great for all styles. Packaging may vary.

OSiS+ Refresh Dust is a bodifying dry shampoo that refreshes your style between washes. The sprayable powder creates excellent volume for all hair types, and helps the hair to stay fresher for longer.

The Refresh Dust is also excellent for freshly washed hair, working to texturize it and make hair easier to style.  It soaks up hair oil and mattifies the hair shaft, making for bouncy and bright hair. The clean fragrance promotes a feeling of vitality and freshness. Keep your hair looking fresh and clean even between washes with the Schwarzkopf OSiS + Refresh Dust Dry Shampoo. This is the ultimate must-have styling accessory for the stylish girl on the go, who always needs to look her best. Packaging may vary.

product_name: OSiS+ Rock Hard Ultra Strong Gel
description:
Rock-Hard Ultra Strong Glue gives you texture for radical styles and shapes. It creates rock-hard, ultra strong control through a glue-like consistency that is easy to work in and to wash out. Ultra Strong Control OSiS Level 4.

A styling gel from Schwarzkopf. Ultra strong hold gel to create and personalize styles. Offers extra-strong control and a durable finish. Great for all hair types.

To use: Apply to damp or dry hair and then style as usual.

Packaging may vary.

This Clay is infused with Kaolin Sandy, forming a super pliable yet gritty clay. The styling experts at OSiS has created the perfect product for creating rugged and laid-back looks. This exciting new product creates a rough matte finish and natural dry feel, this clay can be warmed up and has a workable consistency that's perfect for short to mid-length hair.

Schwarzkopf Professional OSIS+ Sand Clay is a medium hold styling paste that works to add dry texture and definition to hair. Packaging may vary.

OSiS+ Session Extreme Hold Hairspray provides strong hold without leaving a sticky residue or a stiff feel. The formula protects against moisture for up to 48 hours while adding a healthy shine. Fast drying formula for creative styling. Ultra long lasting hold. Strong control power. Super fast drying, non sticky. Brushes out easily. Great for all hair types! How to Use: Apply to dry hair from approx. 12 inches (30 cm) to hold your style in place. Use in short bursts. product_name: L’Oreal Professional Vitamino Fresh Feel Mask - 150mL
description: The creamy texture helps deelpy condition hair resulting in hair that is shiny, smooth and easier to detangle.

With the Liss Unlimited Smoothing Cream offered exclusively in L'Oréal Professionnel salons, you'll experience a unique blow-drying treatment leaving your frizzy and rebellious hair silky smooth and protected, with a long-lasting anti-frizz effect of up to 4 days.

product_name: L’Oréal DIA Light Professional Color Cream - 50ml
description: Our first acidic tone-on-tone colour creates glossy luminous looking reflects and vinyl shine whilst respecting the condition with natural-looking colour that gradually fades away. Ideal for previously coloured or weakened hair or even for those that just want to add a subtle richness or gloss to their natural hair colour. DIA Light is great for offering a colour refresh to top up the vibrancy of your colour in between your usual permanent colour services. The fast development also makes it ideal for those with busy lives and who are short of time. With the technology of DIA Light, your hairdresser will be able to create a truly personalised colour, tailored to you. Tube of 50ml. 43 shades available. AMMONIA-FREE COVERING: Deposits tone only. Zero coverage of white hair. Zero lift. Ideal for previously sensitised or coloured hair DURABILITY: Up to 4 weeks. DEVELOPMENT TIME: 20 mins: Depending on the service provided by your professional hairdresser total service time may vary.

product_name: Joico K-Pak Color Therapy Shampoo 33.8 oz
description: Designed to be both gentle and effective, Joico’s shampoo for coloured hair leaves your locks feeling refreshed and as vibrant as ever. Thanks to a careful blend of ingredients, the shampoo works to preserve and maintain your hair colour’s life, fighting against fade with every use.\n\nIt’s also ideal for improving the appearance of damage because of its powerful cocktail of Keratin, Arginine and Rosehip Oil, all of which come together to fortify your fibres. Using Smart Release Technology, a liposome delivery system ensures you reap the full benefits of these nourishing ingredients in the most efficient way. Topped off with both Argan and Manketti Oils, moisture and colour intensity will be locked in underneath an invisible conditioning shield.

description: It not only protects your color investment (which, we know, is not insignificant these days), but actually hydrates and repairs hair at the same time. How’s that for therapy? Nourishes and hydrates hair, leaving it instantly smoother, shinier and more vibrant. Haircolor is protected from fading that can be caused by environmental stresses and structural damage. Instantly leaves hair smoother, shinier and more vibrant.

Packed with antioxidants, green tea, and UV protectors to protect your locks from fading and tonal change

JoiFull Big, bouncy, and brimming with body; it’s the dream that’s now a reality for fine, thin hair. With this powerfully transformative trio—JoiFull Volumizing Shampoo, Conditioner, and Styler—long-lasting, full, lush, manageable strands come to life, minus the crunchy, sticky residue typical of most volumizing products. Everything fine hair could want from a conditioner: a formula with powerful detangling ingredients designed to create full, airy, touchable body without weighing hair down. This daily-use conditioner nourishes fine strands with a barely-there touch, delivering easy-to-comb glide power and a unique, lightweight feel. In homage to his Irish heritage, Pat Regan (a.k.a. Patty Cuts) has made the green clover the symbol of his success. But with over 118K lnstagram followers, the BaBylissPRO Barber can thank the clean, smooth precision of his artistry, rather than the luck of his tribe, for his superstar status. Humble and unassuming, he lets his impeccably detailed cuts do the talking—and they speak volumes about his skills. Named one of America's best barbers by BarberCon, Patty sets his craft apart with a simplicity that has earned him respect and admiration throughout the industry. His reputation as an elite barber has made him a hot commodity for pro athletes who appreciate his exacting style.

product_name: OLAPLEΧ Traveling Stylist Kit - 30 Applications Steps 1 & 2 of the Revolutionary 3.3 OZ
description: Steps 1 & 2 of the revolutionary, 3-step OLAPLEX professional system in a convenient travel kit. Traveling Stylist Kit is perfect for on-location use for up to 30 applications. Includes: 3.3 oz. Olaplex Bond Multiplier No. 1 (2) 3.3 oz. Olaplex Bond Perfector No. 2 *Note: Olaplex Hair Perfector No. 3 is sold separately. Recommended purchase of 2-4 Olaplex Hair Perfector No. 3 in conjunction with the Salon Intro Kit to complete the 3-step system service.   If you add too much OLAPLEX to your lightener, hair will not lift! Do not use more than 1/4oz. OLAPLEX to 1oz. bleach powder mixed with developer. Pay careful attention to scoop size. Many powders contain 1/2oz. or 15g scoops. Use 1/4oz. OLAPLEX to 2-3 small scoops. Mix your bleach powder with developer thoroughly first, then add OLAPLEX. Do not mix OLAPLEX directly into the bleach powder. After everything is mixed together, you can add more bleach powder for consistency. Processing time will take longer with OLAPLEX. Be patient. It's worth the wait. You must increase your developer one full volume - 10v to 20v, 20v to 30v, 30v to 40v. Do not use 10 volume. OLAPLEX dilutes the developer like water diluting cranberry juice. You must bump it up or processing time will take forever. Never use more than 1/8oz. of OLAPLEX into lightener for balayage (halfway to 1/4oz. line on dosage dispenser). Even if you mix 1oz. lightener for balayage, still use 1/8oz. OLAPLEX. Use 1/8oz. of OLAPLEX in any quantity of base color. Gloss, semi, demi and permanent - you do not need to bump up developer with base color. OLAPLEX has been used thousands of times with amazing results. The only thing that can go wrong is using too much OLAPLEX with lightener or not bumping up your developer one full notch. Remember, 1/4oz. of OLAPLEX to 1oz. of bleach powder mixed with developer. Simple rule

product_name: Its a 10 Silk Express Miracle Silk Leave-In 4 ounces
description:
The world’s favorite leave-in just keeps getting better. Now, it’s a 10 Haircare’s signature leave-in is available with the power and performance of silk protein. Spray on and comb through wet or dry hair for noticeably improved shine and smoothness. Tangles slide out effortlessly, while additional conditioners help reinforce strands from root to tip. Our Silk Leave in fortifies the hair while adding shine and helping to protect against environmental challenges like humidity and dryness.   And, like you’d expect from silk, It’s a 10 Silk Express Miracle Silk Leave-In delivers a lighter-than-air finish.
10 Benefits:  1. Explosive silkiness 2. Thermal protector 3. Detangles 4. Nourishes hair 5. Helps replace lost proteins 6. Helps reduce frizz 7. Inhibits dry, damaged hair 8. Restores shine 9. Enhances hairs natural body 10. Helps prevent split ends How to: Spray evenly from mid shaft to ends on towel dried hair. Do not rinse out. Comb through and style as desired.

product_name: It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Leave-In Plus Keratin 4 oz.
description:
Smooth and sleek are all simpler than ever thanks to the essential Leave-In and effortless spritz-on application of It’s a 10 Miracle Leave-In Plus Keratin. This lightweight, deliciously-smelling conditioner penetrates deep into the hair shaft to help rebuild dry, brittle and damaged hair from the inside out. Hair’s most important nutrient, keratin, is a powerhouse of revitalization and can be used straight out of the shower as a detangler or as a heat-protectant spray. No matter your hair type, this versatile leave in shields against heat, environmental damage, restores & locks in moisture while replenishing lost protein. Soft, shiny, frizz-free tresses are guarded against humidity, while sealing the cuticle for mirror-smooth straight styles, all while improving your hair health with every application.
10 Benefits: 
  1. Protects the natural keratin in hair
  2. Thermal protector
  3. Detangles
  4. Helps fortify the hair
  5. Helps replace lost proteins
  6. Helps reduce frizz
  7. Natural UV protection
  8. Restores shine
  9. Enhances hair natural body
  10. Helps protect hair color
How to: Spray evenly from mid shaft to ends  on towel dried hair.  Do not rinse out. Comb through and style as desired. Styling Tip: Use product to smooth down flyaways, or gently coat hair before placing in rollers or twists for a softening styling spray. Or use prior to blow drying or styling to minimize heat damaged hair while maximizing shine and luster.

Ceramic radiates far-infrared heat and emits negative ions, reducing static electricity and decreasing styling time. description: The BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium™ clip/clipless curling irons offer exceptional styling flexibility. Use it like a spring curling iron, for tight, defined curls; or use it clipless, like a wand, for looser curls and waves. Nano titanium is an exceptional conductor of heat and maintains stability in ultra-high temperatures. It yields maximum far-infrared heat, penetrating the hair shaft from within for professional styling without damage. Sol-Gel technology makes the iron barrels stronger and smoother than those of standard irons. Available in: 1" and 1-1/4" barrel sizes.

product_name: Gamma Professionals X-Ergo Gamma+ Magnetic (1PC) Clipper
description:
INCREASED TORQUE 9V MICROCHIPPED MOTOR

The magnetic motor, the holy grail of clipper motors, just got souped-up. Already considered the most heavy-duty and professional motor, the X-ERGO features the latest in magnetic motor technology with a microchipped PC board and 9V motor for even more power and torque.

This turbocharged long-life magnetic motor runs at 10,000 strokes per minute, not only offering the ultimate in speed, power, and longevity but the quietest performance of any professional clipper.

PERFECTLY BALANCED MODULAR ERGONOMIC DESIGN
The fully modular X-Ergo clipper includes Matte Gold, Matte Rose Gold, and Matte Chrome body kits to create different custom modifications. The transparent thumb rest is engineered to be perfectly balanced in your hand. The X-Ergo features customizable taper options for the most consistent results.

BLACK DIAMOND CARBON DLC BLADE
Fully adjustable DLC fixed taper blade with DLC shallow cutter can be easily zero gapped for the closest cut and finish. Highest quality Black Diamond Carbon DLC blade stays cooler, rust-free, and sharper longer.

NEXT LEVEL CUSTOMIZATION & LONG BATTERY LIFE
Featuring never before seen customization options the X-Ergo offers 3 varying lever choices: 2 click system levers and 1 floating system lever. Also included, Tight or Stretch taper bracket kits for long or short taper options. With a 120 minute cordless runtime and 105 minute re-charge.

MICROCHIPPED MAGNETIC MOTOR WITH MAGNETIC GUARDS
The X-Ergo is equipped with a turbocharged, microchipped motor. Operating at lightening speed the X-Ergo runs at 10,000 strokes per minute, fine tuned for maximum power.

BLACK MAGNETIC GUARDS & BRACKET OPTIONS
A complete set of 8 professional double neodymium magnetic guards are included. Designed and engineered to prevent clipper blade teeth from rubbing and an advanced hair channel system on outer teeth for improved feeding of hair to the blade. Magnets are securely fastened to the guards and will not fall off. The double magnet system ensures your guards will stay in place during your haircut. Also included is a special stretch bracket designed to be used with the floating (non-click) lever. Use this bracket to extend your taper to a full #1!

description: Equipped with a lightweight and powerful digital brushless motor that runs at 7,500 strokes per minute with an upgraded PCB board fine-tuned for increased power to help you successfully plow through even the wiriest of hair. As such, you can do an efficient cut in just a single pass with this efficient haircutting tool.  The high-performance motor is paired with premium double Black Diamond Carbon DLC blades. Together, they work to give you superb cutting performance without any snags. Furthermore, the blades are non-corrosive so you don't have to worry about rust.  They also stay cooler and sharper longer.\n\nThat said, this hair clipper makes an excellent gift for the professional barber and hairstylist. It's also a wonderful gift for that special man in your life who prefers doing his own buzz cuts at home.

description:

Cut through bulk hair and fade different hair types with the Oster Professional Cordless Classic 76 Clipper. Featuring the acclaimed power and durability of the Oster Classic 76, with a long-lasting lithium-ion battery for cordless use.

Detachable Stainless Steel Blade

description:
Use: Put the desired amount of wax into the shave factory wax heater until it is completely melted. Allow the wax to cool until it has reached a honey consistency. Ensure the area you want to wax is clean and dry.

Test the temperature of the wax in a small area.

Apply the wax with a spatula in a thickness of 1 mm to the hair in the direction of wax. After 3-4 seconds, lift the wax with two fingers and pull it parallel to the body in the opposite direction of hair growth with a single motion. Then clean your skin with the Shave Factory wax and massage oil.

After waxing, you should not go to the sea or pool for 2 hours.

Power meets technology. This powerful 1875-watt hairdryer features ceramic technology to produce extra-gentle, even, far-infrared heat that protects hair from damage. product_name: BaBylissPRO Ceramix Xtreme lonic & Ceramic Hairdryer , Black
description:
BaBylissPRO Ceramix Extreme lonic and Ceramic Hairdryer

The soft-touch, rubberized housing on this premium hairdryer provides a secure grip that makes it exceptionally easy to work with. Engineered with two of styling’s hottest technologies, this dryer produces gentle, even, far-infrared heat to dry hair fast and protect it from damage. Generating clouds of natural ions to eliminate static, it leaves even frizzy hair shiny and smooth.

Technology

ION GENERATOR A micro-chip is embedded in the mechanics of the appliance and emits a continuous stream of negative ions. Negative ion energy is powerful enough to break apart clusters of water molecules. The smaller water molecules penetrate into the hair shaft by slipping between the cuticles, adding plumpness/volume to hair. The bombardment of negative ions also closes the hair cuticle, which is very good for the health and appearance of the hair. CERAMIC Ceramic is a non-metallic material that is durable, smooth and retains and distributes heat efficiently; it also radiates far infrared heat. Far Infrared (FIR) rays are electro-magnetic waves of energy, totally invisible to the naked eye, capable of penetrating deep into the human body, including the hair shaft. It therefore dries the hair from the inside out. The result is that more moisture remains in the hair shaft and there is less damage to the hair.

With its Light Pressure Response (LPR) technology, dual sensors on both sides of the pistol grip housing activates or pauses airflow at the lightest touch. Control airflow without repositioning your grip, free your hands for sectioning, or place the dryer on a surface to pause and conserve energy. Directions

Description

Think Blonde! Wella Blondor Multi Blonde Powder Lightener 800G is for both on and off the scalp lightening. It’s dust free and completely odorless. Simple and safe mixing with revolutionary easy-to-pour dispensing system, which makes no direct contact with the stylist’s skin. Gives perfect results for both on and off-scalp techniques. Variable mixing ratio provides individual choice of consistency. Blondor creates a new dimension in lightening and highlighting techniques.

  • From Blondor’s high quality range of professional lightening products
  • For beautiful blonde results
  • It’s Tri-Lightening Complex ensures effective lightening
  • With Anti-Yellow Molecules for clear blonde results
  • Controlled and reliable lightening with up to 7 levels of lift
  • Suitable for all applications and techniques
  • Blue bleach, creamy consistency

Benefits

  • Dependable results every time
  • Contains moisture-retaining lipids
  • Creamy consistency ideal for creative foil techniques
  • Dust-free powder
  • Odor-free
  • No Ammonia

Suggested Use

Please refer to manufacturers instructions on mixing ratios.

  1. Lightening Preparation: Depending on the desired degree of lightening mix with Welloxon Perfect Pastel, 6%, 9%, 12% in a ratio of 1:1 up to 1:2 in a non-metallic Bowl. The lower the peroxide strength, the gentler the lightening process. If there is contact with scalp, do not use a peroxide strength higher than 6%.
  2. Application: Apply the bleaching mixture evenly to dry hair. The development time depends on the condition of the hair and the desired result. Carefully check hair every 5-10 minutes during the process. The maximum total development time is 50 minutes. If adverse reaction occurs during treatment (e.g. itching, burning or rash or any unexpected reaction), stop and immediately rinse with lukewarm water. If necessary, seek medical advice.
  3. After Treatment: After development time is complete, rinse out thoroughly with warm water and shampoo. Apply Blondor Blonde Seal & Care after rinsing for increased shine and condition.

This spray cologne provides sexy-smelling skin that’s touchably smooth and irritation-free. Smooth skin looks and feels amazing, but why not take it to the third level with amazing scent too? A splash of dynamic, invigorating fragrance provides instant sex appeal and uplifts your senses. Whether you shave at home or you want to offer standout barber service, our men’s aftershave is a sure-fire finishing touch. It revitalizes post-shave skin with incredible scent, while moisturizing and hydrating for a kissably soft face. It also reduces redness and protects against irritation and breakouts. Aqua: Grapefruit, Lemon, Mint, Pink Pepper How to Use
  • After shaving, rinse the skin with cold water and pat dry
  • Spray some cologne onto your palms and rub your hands together
  • Apply the cologne to the skin evenly and massage in

Dexe Natural black Hair Shampoo natural plant rapid hair dye long lasting hair color Shampoo change color for Men and Women.

Comes with 10 sachets which is equivalent to 10 washes/uses.

Instructions for use:

1. Put on gloves (otherwise the nails will be dyed grey,although that does not affect health)

2. Make your hair wet with both your hands.

3. Wipe off the water on the hair.

4. Promptly put the shampoo on the hair and rub it until it reaches the bottom of the hairs, then rub the hair for 5-10 minutes so that the shampoo moistens the bottom of each hair.

5. Wash the shampoo away.

6. The hair will become dark and shiny.

product_name: Andis Tourmaline Ceramic Ionic Salon Hair Dryer with Diffuser
description:
• QUICK DRY LIGHTWEIGHT: 1875W professional hairdryer, lightweight design promises comfortable, ergonomic use.
  • ENHANCES SHINE: The ceramic Tourmaline ionic technology design minimizes frizz and increases shine.
  • PERFECT COLD AIR: The motor and heating are operated separately by the Andis dryer. The motor only works in cold wind mode. When you switch from warm to cold mode, chilly air flows out quickly without being lukewarm.
  • ERGONOMIC & SAFETY DESIGN: The ergonomic design takes into account the total weight and grip, allowing you to remain comfortable even after extended usage. The filter cap may also be simply removed and cleaned.
  • PRODUCT DETAILS: This Model Andis 80750 1875-Watt Tourmaline Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer measures 4.13 x 12.13 x 9.38 inches and weighs ‎1.81 pounds, variable heat and speed settings provide styling options.
